title: u cant give me a ban
body: I WAS IN LOADING SCREEN AND LEAGUE SAYS THIS PROGRAMME CANNOT RUN ON WINDOWS WHEN IT WORKED PERFECTLY FINE

replies.body:
That's really strange. Unfortunately the low priority queue punishment cannot be removed, but I'm sure the issue fixable if it was working before :D

If you want some help from me or a wrenchmen, we're going to need a few things first:

1. A screen shot of that error message

2. Your CPU speed and RAM (check out [this video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DhqVVS-ZzMg) if you don't know how to find it)

lpq timer can be removed they just don't do it even if you don't deserve it(quality support) back in 2016 OCE had a connection issue and people who got lpq timers because if it could get them removed and reset

It can't be removed by player support. If a global issue occurs then I'm sure there is a way to remove them from a particular set of people all at once by someone who has higher permissions or something, but player support *cannot* remove an LPQ.
This shit happens all the fucking time.
